apis.name: Pages domains API
apis.description: The GitLab Pages feature must be enabled to use these endpoints. Find out more about administering and using the feature.

apis.name: List all Pages domains
apis.description: Get a list of all Pages domains. The user must have administrator access.

apis.name: List Pages domains
apis.description: Get a list of project Pages domains. The user must have permissions to view Pages domains.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

apis.name: Single Pages domain
apis.description: Get a single project Pages domain. The user must have permissions to view Pages domains.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: domain
attributes.description: The custom domain indicated by the user

apis.name: Create new Pages domain
apis.description: Create a new Pages domain with an automatic certificate:

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: domain
attributes.description: The custom domain indicated by the user

attributes.name: auto_ssl_enabled
attributes.description: Enables automatic generation of SSL certificates issued by Let’s Encrypt for custom domains.

attributes.name: certificate
attributes.description: The certificate in PEM format with intermediates following in most specific to least specific order.

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: The certificate key in PEM format.

apis.name: Update Pages domain
apis.description: Updates an existing project Pages domain. The user must have permissions to change an existing Pages domains.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: domain
attributes.description: The custom domain indicated by the user

attributes.name: auto_ssl_enabled
attributes.description: Enables automatic generation of SSL certificates issued by Let’s Encrypt for custom domains.

attributes.name: certificate
attributes.description: The certificate in PEM format with intermediates following in most specific to least specific order.

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: The certificate key in PEM format.

apis.name: Adding certificate
apis.description: Add a certificate for a Pages domain by using a variable containing the certificate:

apis.name: Enabling Let’s Encrypt integration for Pages custom domains
Removing certificate
apis.description: To remove the SSL certificate attached to the Pages domain, run:

apis.name: Delete Pages domain
apis.description: Deletes an existing project Pages domain.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: domain
attributes.description: The custom domain indicated by the user
